ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE CORRECTIONS AND CONDITIONAL RELEASE REGULATIONS which will enhance public safety by ensuring that all offenders are given a security classification that is consistent with the risk they present, and that takes into account a DO designation imposed by the court.
